name: DrugNotAvailable
title: Drug Not Available
description: Developed by OFMQ for Immunization measures
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values represents that a drug is not available because it is out of stock.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify the reason for not administering a medication using this value set.  Using the Quality Data Model, this particular value set is used with the Negation rationale with the datatype Medication, Administered.),(Inclusion Criteria: Only include codes which represent that a drug is not available because it is out of stock.   Codes used are to be SNOMED codes only.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude codes that do not meet the inclusion criteria.)

concept.display: Drug not available - out of stock (finding)

contains.display: Drug not available - out of stock (finding)
